name: Waggy Bird
description:
How many can a bird grab ?

Waggy Bird is a new and completely funny arcade game.
The game is simple.
_ Touch, drag, grab blue obstacles.
_ Dodge fruits and other obstacles to survive with your small bird.

Features:
.Move your bird by touch and drag it.
.One scene mode only.
.Can be played offline! No Wifi or Internet connection required!
